title: Evidence in support of war entry

content.prompt: A limitation of the excerpt as evidence of the reasons for United States entry into the First World War was that it

choices.label: expressed opposition to war with Germany
was given by an influential political leader
asserted that Germans supported the war
was delivered during the war declaration debates

topic.text: 7.5: World War I - Military and Diplomacy

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
